CardSubTitle: Steps to evaluate the features of the product online before running from github
CardSubInfo: The tool can be run locally by downloading from the github link

CardList.CardInfo: Click the Create Demo AppDomain Button and enter any valid phone no and any valid user email and password
Click the Top of the Screen to Open the Inspect Toolbar and Sign In using Registerd email and password
Click the Copy Menu to Show the Copy Screen. Select the MainContent as Placholder and Add the Card List Component
Click the Edit Menu and Modify the Card List Json by Cloning the Array List and Modifying any of the Values
Click the Clone Menu to Copy the Main App View to a Demo App View
Click the Config Menu in the Account Menu to View the Config Screen and Open and Set the Start Page to the Newly Created View
